content: this legal text discusses the division of assets between two parties mr nb and spouses gb and mm the assets in question are two real estate units located in castelfidardo italy the first unit is 201 square meters and the second unit is 179 square meters mr nb is allocated the first unit and the spouses are allocated the second unit the value of each share is €29000 the division is based on a termination of the existing communal ownership agreement the parties agree to the division and specify the details of each share including the cadastral data and boundaries the text also mentions that the areas in question are undevelopable due to neighboring properties and slight differences in surface area
